title: when does the SKIN YASUO come out !! EU WEST
body:
when does the SKIN YASUO come out !! EU WEST  

Am waiting the patch 7.12 but the Skin not included?????????????? PLEA I NEED TO KNOW THE DATE

replies.body: if it help you wait, there is an event for the skin release planned for saturday on the french community, so at worst they should be available at that time

Couldn't say for sure!  Patch notes might suggest what skins are aimed for release, but it doesn't always mean on patch day.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page to stay up to date!
